data.title: Michael and Susan Dell Foundation
data.meta_description: Facilitates grants and impact investments to provide economic stability through education, financial services, jobs and livelihoods with the help of other stakeholders
data.text:
The primary objective revolves around enhancing educational outcomes for underserved students and expanding their access to a high-quality education. Recognizing that progress hinges on accurate measurement, it actively contributes to the development and implementation of standardized assessments, providing a roadmap for enhancing both learning and teaching.

It commits its resources to significant, statewide initiatives aimed at elevating student learning, teacher competencies, school management, and educational leadership. To rectify educational disparities, it emphasizes the enhancement of data management, classroom resources, and teacher training. The Indian partners work closely with educators and school administrators to harness data for a profound understanding of student performance and to enhance the learning experience. Furthermore, it supports service providers in the creation of innovative classroom tools capable of amplifying the learning process.

It endeavours to expand access to essential banking services for families of limited financial means, enabling them to better manage their finances and secure loans to enhance their income prospects. It is dedicated to facilitating opportunities for youth to find meaningful employment, fostering their growth and success.

India boasts a population exceeding 400 million individuals between the ages of 15 and 29; however, many lack the requisite skills to fill the high-demand job positions. The mission is to empower youth from economically disadvantaged backgrounds with the vocational skills and employment prospects necessary to elevate their earning potential in today's competitive job market.

The array of financial services is tailored to meet the needs of low-income households, encompassing micro-savings, micro-mortgages, and loans catering to businesses of varying scales. It champions digital services designed to enhance people's access to financial resources at a more affordable cost
